content:
Hi, I am seeing issue in _typefilter. Looks like its not filtering records based on my search criteria, it's returning the full payload in response.

It's returning all the rows regardless of the state filter criteria

POST url is http://<servername>:<port>/$export

Here is the body:

{

"resourceType": "Parameters",

"parameter": [

{

"name": "_outputFormat",

"valueString": "application/fhir+ndjson"

},

{

"name": "_type",

"valueString": "Location"

},

{

"name": "_typeFilter",

"valueString": "Location?address-state=IL"

}
]

}
Does the server support the address-state Location search parameter?

Im not sure what server you're testing against but the bulk data spec reads: "Understanding _typeFilter is OPTIONAL for FHIR servers; clients SHOULD be robust to servers that ignore _typeFilter." link to spec: https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/export/index.html#experimental-query-parameters

yes, if i do GET REST call with http://<server>:<port>/Location?address-state=IL
It filters the records and i get the filtered response.

Thanks Ryan!
But is there any way to filter the records in Bulk export if not _typefilter. How can i filter records size using _type. Because i only specify the Entity name in _type.
_typeFilter is the only solution today, and it's experimental + optional for servers. (Getting agreement on more than this proved to be quite a challenge.)
